# Problem 11.3 - By Integration of Moment Equation {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A cantilever beam of length L = 4 m is subjected to a distributed load w = 2 kN/m and couple M = 5 kN-m. Determine the deflection of the beam at the free end. Assume EI = 25,000 kN-m<sup>2</sup>.
